LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Info
LocaleResource.Value: Note: "Additional fee" will support in only Paid and Trial license version.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.CategorieIds.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select Categories to restrict the COD payment method.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.DescriptionText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter info that will be shown to customers during checkout

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.AdditionalFeePer.Invalid
LocaleResource.Value: Additional fee percentage must be between 0 to 100.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.ShippableProductRequired.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: An option indicating whether shippable products are required in order to display this payment method during checkout.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.SkipPaymentInfo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: An option indicating whether we should display a payment information page for this plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.MinimumPrice.Required
LocaleResource.Value: Minimum order amount should be positive.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.MinimumPrice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: It allows you to set the minimum order amount to show the Cash On Delivery option.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.MaximumPrice.Required
LocaleResource.Value: Maximum order amount should be positive.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.MaximumPrice.Invalid
LocaleResource.Value: Maximum price must be greater than minimum price.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.MaximumPrice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: It allows you to set the maximum order amount to show the Cash On Delivery option.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.COD.Admin.Configure.Fields.AppliedToAllProduct.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to display Cash On Delivery payment method to all products including virtual gift card, Downloadable products.
